divs: Sighting DetailsAs I turned left onto my street, I observed three lights in a loose chevron pattern hovering above a service station about 200 yards distant. I parked and exited my vehicle and walked to the street to get a better look, but the object had vanished. Several neighbors were also outside looking in the same direction. I did not ask if anyone else had seen the object. The event took place just before 7:00 pm on December 3, 2011. I was returning from the grocery. As I turned the corner I spotted the lights. They seemed to be out of place. The area is well lit and the service station is brightly lit at night. The lights were motionless above the station and were gone by the time I got out of my vehicle.
Summary: Witnessed lights while driving. Object was gone by the time I parked.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Middletown
There were no other sightings in Middletown on or around December 3rd 2011
